metadata.name: HackTool - Typical HiveNightmare SAM File Export
metadata.comment: Detects files written by the different tools that exploit HiveNightmare

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM file_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 3 AND (contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\\\hive_sam_')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\\\sam-2021-')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\\\sam-2022-')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\\\sam-2023-')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\\\sam-haxx')) OR contains(lower(file.path), lower('\\\\sam.save'))) AND lower(file.path) = lower('c:\\\\windows\\\\temp\\\\sam'))

output.summary: Detects files written by the different tools that exploit HiveNightmare

metadata.objective: False positive: Files that accidentally contain these strings References: https://github.com/GossiTheDog/HiveNightmare, https://github.com/FireFart/hivenightmare/, https://github.com/WiredPulse/Invoke-HiveNightmare, https://twitter.com/cube0x0/status/1418920190759378944
